productName: Asics Gel Lethal Field Men’s Cricket Shoes
description: The Asics Gel Lethal Field Mens Cricket Shoes are designed for hard-wicket use and to keep your feet supported.Featuring an Amplifoam midsole and GEL in the rear foot for great comfort, the solid rubber dimpled outsole offers a firm grip on the wicket and on the field.
